data.text: Please wait for the roles to be assigned

data.message: **Welcome to the GolmiEval Task!** Describe the highlighted piece on the board on the right so that another person could **uniquely** identify it.
If you're not sure which piece is the target, just click on it! If that's your target, I'll tell you so.
Once you're ready you can simply send your description with the chat on the bottom. You will see a total of 15 boards
Here's a little help: you can reference pieces according to this legend
the dark green y-shaped piece nearest to the top
the red t-shaped piece in the middle
a light blue l-shaped piece in the left upper corner
an orange n-shaped piece on the lower right
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
the grey p-shaped piece closest to the top
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
**You need to send at least one message before you can move on.** Remember to press enter to send your description
Still 5 boards to go. You almost made it!
of the three dark green "z"s on the right side the one in the middle
purple "y" in the lower right corner
blue piece in between two orange pieces
That was the last one, thank you very much for your help
The room is closing, thanky you for plaing
The room is closing, thanky you for plaing
